      • Stock

        public Stock(Stock sIn)
      throws BadSymbolException,
             BadNameException,
             BadQuantityException,
             BadPriceException
        Copy constructor for the Stock. Attempts to return a deep copy of the passed Stock. Sadly ArrayList only has clone, which is shallow copy. We haven't learned enough to make a fully robust copy.
        Parameters:
        sIn -
        Throws:
        BadSymbolException
        BadNameException
        BadQuantityException
        BadPriceException
